Title: More Torch Tossing
Description:
Hello, fire juggler!  Are you having fun and making fiery mayhem?  That's what I like to hear!  Now, do you think you're an expert at torch tossing?  Then I have a test for you...

You know the rules: toss torches at the marked braziers.  This time, however, you are timed and have a LOT more braziers to hit.

Ready?
ObjectivesText: Win the torch tossing game, then speak with the Master Fire Eater.
